item.title: Custom Yells [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

Okay well, before anything… Incase of you people that go around and say “this is a snippet” I have explained things in this, therefor… it is a tutorial. (if i get complaints about it i will simply move it, no big deal.)

First off go to, server file<src<server<model<players<packets<commands.java

Search for your yell command ofc, if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
now scroll down and you will see stuff close to this: if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Adobe")) { c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[example of custom]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 1){ c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 2){ c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 3){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 5){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 6){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 7){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
Probably not the 5-7 but that’s my hidden mod-owner yells, ignore them.

Now go back up to the top and right under if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
you can start making them, first off copy and paste this right under that^: }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Adobe")) { c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[example of custom]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
then you can change “adobe” to your user, “example of custom” to your custom yell title, and to your color, hope this helped.

EDIT: i seen this more as a snippet tbh, sorry, Please lock this. I’ve posted it in snippets

Read full topic
